titleStmt.title: A true relation brought by the Lord of Buisson, and sent by the French King concerning the defeat of the Lord Soubizes army, his Maiestie being there in person. With The surprising of the castle of Chaume about the sands of Psonne the 18. of this present month of Aprill. 1622

publicationStmt.publisher: by Fredericke Morel the Kings ordinarie printer, by authority, and now orderly translated,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
